channel.title: Runebay ,.-=Quests, Pking, And more=-.,
channel.description:
This is developement thread for Runebay... Updates will be posted under features.
[CENTER][IMG]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/2153/supportf.png[/img] Client Download(MUST HAVE):
[S]V1:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?hi5edmjmdea]http://www.mediafire.com/?hi5edmjmdea[/url] [/S] V2:http://www.multiupload.com/DBHYWOYZQG If you downloaded the V1 Client it will NOT work anymore! You MUST download the V2 Client! It has HUGE updates done to it!
[IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/3355/support.png[/img] This server IS Economy Based. You Have to WORK to get the items you want! There still Is Pking and still Is an amazing combat system, Im just saying that you cant go around spawning things with ::item. Most skills work so dont worry about not being able to find something you need!
[IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/7978/supporteg.png[/img]
[COLOR="DarkOrange"][B][U]Rico Kuban[/U][/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/3355/support.png[/img] Smithing Woodcutting Great Combat System Crafting 100% Mage Range and Melee Prayer Runecrafting Fletching Herblore Slayer Mining Theiving Fishing Cooking ETC... (Every skill besides Agility(like 50%) Farming and Firemaking...)
Ring of recoil Trading Dueling (staking also) Many Quests Economy (cant spawn!) Doors Dialogue No errors Stable Ability to hold 1k+ players! Items such as Godsword SaraSword and more! Premium rank. Donator rank. Pest Control Barrows Jad Minigame Protect item works
Much Much More
[IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/7874/supportdl.png[/img] [URL=http://img80.imageshack.us/i/duel2f.jpg/][IMG]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/8937/duel2f.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img148.imageshack.us/i/spoils.jpg/][IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/1888/spoils.jpg[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/235/duel2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Untitled2345.png[/img] [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Untitled234.png[/img] [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Untitled23.png[/img] [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Untitled2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/Untitled.png[/img] [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/30ifgae.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2m4rga8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z140/yasel16/PCstats.png[/img]
<object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/BsWPBhnjGQQ&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/BsWPBhnjGQQ&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>
[/center] Based off of battlescape

item.title: Runebay ,.-=Quests, Pking, And more=-.,
item.dc:creator: @TookieScape TookieScape
item.description:
@TookieScape wrote:

This is developement thread for Runebay…
Updates will be posted under features.

[CENTER]
Client Download(MUST HAVE):

V1:http://www.mediafire.com/?hi5edmjmdea

V2:http://www.multiupload.com/DBHYWOYZQG
If you downloaded the V1 Client it will NOT work anymore! You MUST download the V2 Client! It has HUGE updates done to it!


This server IS Economy Based. You Have to WORK to get the items you want! There still Is Pking and still Is an amazing combat system, Im just saying that you cant go around spawning things with ::item. Most skills work so dont worry about not being able to find something you need!

[COLOR=“DarkOrange”]Rico
Kuban[/COLOR]

Great Combat System

ETC…
(Every skill besides Agility(like 50%) Farming and Firemaking…)

Many Quests
Economy (cant spawn!)
Doors

No errors
Stable
Ability to hold 1k+ players!
Items such as Godsword SaraSword and more!
Premium rank.
Donator rank.

Protect item works

Much Much More
